Jules Simplicio is a designer of software products. Born and raised in São Paulo, living in Chicago. Currently designing web and mobile apps at dscout.

In the past, apprenticed design under Basecamp and Threadless, and practiced front-end development for a startup that has since been acquired.

Mentor of design students from DESIGNATION.

Email or Follow @JulesSimplicio

New dscout for Android

The researcher experience with dscout Diary was redesigned when we introduced mission parts. Now missions are capable of being divided up into parts, so researchers don’t have to analyze data across separate missions.
